QuestData.Title: Troll Patrol: Couldn't Care Less
QuestData.Description: Of all the posts, they throw me in this one.$b$bThe place is flooded with putrid, stagnant water and now it's host to sewage elementals!$b$bI don't really know what they are or why they're here, and frankly I couldn't care less. What I do know is they're making a mess of my sector! How am I supposed to conduct any dignified military operations with those foul things roaming around?$b$bGet out there, $c, and don't come back 'til you've cleared your share of 'em off of my battlefield!
QuestData.LogDescription: Captain Grondel wants you to kill 7 Mossy Rampagers in Drak'Agal.
QuestData.RewardText: You sure about that, $r?$b$bSeems to me like there are more of them things out there now than when you started!
